title: Order New Checks
description: A customer has run out of checks and needs to order a new box.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the checking account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their primary checking account.

tasks.description: Confirm the check style, quantity, and shipping address with the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all order details are correct.

tasks.description: Place the check order through the bank's vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the order and provides the customer with an estimated delivery date.
